solution_line_template: Five months ago, Mike earned ten times more money than Fred, and since Fred earned ${fred_salary}, Mike earned {mike_multiplier}*{fred_salary} = $<<{mike_multiplier}*{fred_salary}={mike_earned_more_than_fred}>>{mike_earned_more_than_fred} more than Fred.

The total amount of money that Mike earned five months ago is ${mike_earned_more_than_fred}+${fred_salary} = $<<{mike_earned_more_than_fred}+{fred_salary}={mike_salary_five_months_ago}>>{mike_salary_five_months_ago}
